arch:property.oc:show_val: Max. Pres. Height 0.600 m, Max. Pres. Depth 0.345 m, Max. Pres. Width across arms 0.280 m, Max. Pres. Height of stool, at front 0.280 m, Max. Pres. Depth of stool, at top 0.227 m, projection of stool at bottom 0.070 m, Max. Pres. Width of stool, at back 0.188 m, Max. Pres. Width of stool leg at top. 0.075 m, Max. Pres. Length of stool leg, from bottom of seat 0.235 m, Max. Pres. Thickness of fabric: at hem of garment 0.025 m - 0.022 m, inside right front leg of stool 0.028 m, at back of figure 0.027 m, at upper front edge of figure 0.026 m, Max. Pres. Thickness at left front leg of stool 0.058 m
Will be described in the description section
Coarse clay, with numerous impurities, including small stones and mica; fired to an orange-brown on the surfaces, dark gery-brown inside the thicker pieces. Traces of red paint.

div.p:
The Poggio Civitate Excavation Project website originally included this object at this address:
http://poggiocivitate.classics.umass.edu/catalog/viewartifactcatalog.asp?fid=PC1966029700
